name.ja: スイスアーミーナイフ

kr: 스킬 공격 시, 대상의 치유 효과가 40% 감소
en: Skills reduce target's healing received by 40%
ja: スキル攻撃のダメージを受けた対象の治癒効果が40%減少
cn: Skills reduce target's healing received by 40%

kr: 단일 실험체에게 4초 안에 기본 공격 또는 개별의 피해를 입히는 스킬을 3회 적중 시(무기, 아이템 스킬 제외), <루드라의 단검> 상태가 됩니다
기본 공격이 연타로 적용되는 무기, 스킬 및 도트 딜링 스킬은 입히는 연속 피해를 한 번의 피해로 취급
en: Hitting a single enemy with a basic attack or skill 3 times within 4 seconds grants you <Rudra Embodied>
Excludes multiple hit effects
Cooldown: 7s
ja: 4秒以内に3回の個別ダメージを加えると＜ルドラの短剣＞になります。
クールダウン:7秒
cn: Hitting a single enemy with a basic attack or skill 3 times within 4 seconds grants you <Rudra Embodied>
Excludes multiple hit effects
Cooldown: 7s

en: Attack Power: +21%
Movement speed: +24%
Duration: 3 seconds
ja: 攻撃力:21%増加
移動速度:24%増加
3秒間
cn: Attack Power: +21%
Movement speed: +24%
Duration: 3 seconds

en: Your next basic attack gains a 100% bonus critical strike chance
Cooldown: 4s
ja: 次の基本攻撃が100%の致命打確率ボーナスを獲得
クールダウン:4秒
cn: Your next basic attack gains a 100% bonus critical strike chance
Cooldown: 4s

kr: 적 실험체에게 피해를 받아 체력이 40% 이하가 될 때 발동
en: When dropping below 40% HP after taking damage from an enemy player
You are cleansed of all debuffs and crowd control effects
You gain a (150 + Character Level*10) HP shield for 2.5 seconds
50% Tenacity for 8 seconds
15 Attack Power for 8 seconds
HP Recovery on you is 15% more effective for 8 seconds
Cooldown: 50s
ja: 着用者が敵実験体にダメージを受け、体力が40%以下になる時
すべてのデバフを解除
2.5秒間150+キャラクターレベル*10のシールドを獲得
50%の行動妨害耐性を獲得
8秒間攻撃力が15増加
受ける回復量が15%増加
クールダウン:50秒
cn: When dropping below 40% HP after taking damage from an enemy player
You are cleansed of all debuffs and crowd control effects
You gain a (150 + Character Level*10) HP shield for 2.5 seconds
50% Tenacity for 8 seconds
15 Attack Power for 8 seconds
HP Recovery on you is 15% more effective for 8 seconds
Cooldown: 50s

kr: 기본 공격 적중 시, 대상에게 80의 고유 피해
en: Your next basic attack deals 80 extra cellular damage
Slows your target by 30% for 2 seconds
Cooldown: 6s
ja: 次に加える基本攻撃が80の追加固有ダメージ
2秒間移動速度を30%だけ減少
クールダウン:6秒
cn: Your next basic attack deals 80 extra cellular damage
Slows your target by 30% for 2 seconds
Cooldown: 6s

kr: 스킬 공격에 적중당한 적은 0.56초간 이동속도 99% 감소
en: Dealing damage to an enemy with a skill slows them by 99% for 0.56 seconds
Cooldown: 4s
ja: スキルで敵にダメージを与えると、0.56秒間移動速度を99%だけ減少
クールダウン:4秒
cn: Dealing damage to an enemy with a skill slows them by 99% for 0.56 seconds
Cooldown: 4s

kr: 기본 공격 시, 매초 최대 체력의 1%의 고정 피해를 입히는 디버프를 부여
en: Each basic applies a stack of Smolder, dealing 1% of the enemy’s max HP as true damage.
4s Duration
Max 4 Stacks
ja: 基本攻撃時、毎秒最大体力1%の固定ダメージを与えるデバフを付与します。
4秒間持続
最大4スタック
cn: Each basic applies a stack of Smolder, dealing 1% of the enemy’s max HP as true damage.
4s Duration
Max 4 Stacks

kr: 기본 공격이 적 실험체에게 명중시 발동
en: Hitting a test subject with a basic attack deals
Damage equal to 7% of the target’s current HP
Grants you a stack of Vigor for 5 seconds
ja: 基本攻撃が敵実験体に的中する時
敵実験体の現在体力の7%のダメージ
5秒間情熱スタックを獲得
cn: Hitting a test subject with a basic attack deals
Damage equal to 7% of the target’s current HP
Grants you a stack of Vigor for 5 seconds

en: Each stack of Vigor
Increases your Attack Speed by 8%
Duration: 5s
At 3 stacks, you gain extra 20 Attack Power and 0.2 Movement speed
ja: 重畳された情熱スタックにつき
攻撃速度:+8%
最大3重畳すると、20の攻撃力と0.2の移動速度を追加
cn: Each stack of Vigor
Increases your Attack Speed by 8%
Duration: 5s
At 3 stacks, you gain extra 20 Attack Power and 0.2 Movement speed

kr: 충전 스택에 따라 최대 0.08의 이동속도 추가
다음 기본 공격 시 스택을 모두 소모하여 최대 120의 고유피해
최대 스택 공격 시 2초간 상대의 이동 속도 25% 감소
en: Gain a stack every move, up to 24m
Your movement speed will increase by up to 0.08, based on how many stacks you have
Basic attacks consume all stacks, dealing up to 120 cellular damage
At max stacks, your next basic attack slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds
ja: 移動するたびに[軽い足取り]を最大24mまで重畳して獲得
重畳によって移動速度が最大0.08まで増加します
基本攻撃ダメージを与える場合、重畳をすべて消費して最大120の固有ダメージを与えます
最大重畳状態でダメージを受けた対象の移動速度を2秒間25%減少させます
cn: Gain a stack every move, up to 24m
Your movement speed will increase by up to 0.08, based on how many stacks you have
Basic attacks consume all stacks, dealing up to 120 cellular damage
At max stacks, your next basic attack slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds

en: Reduces crowd control effects by 30%
ja: 制圧、エアボーン、ノックバック、捕まりを除外したデバフの持続時間が30%減少
cn: Reduces crowd control effects by 30%

kr: 기본 공격 시, 대상의 치유 효과가 4초간 40% 감소
en: Basic attacks reduce target's healing received by 40%
ja: 基本攻撃を受けた対象の治癒効果が40%減少
cn: Basic attacks reduce target's healing received by 40%

kr: 스킬 공격 시, 대상의 치유 효과가 40% 감소
en: Skills reduce target's healing received by 40%
ja: スキル攻撃のダメージを受けた対象の治癒効果が40%減少
cn: Skills reduce target's healing received by 40%

kr: 스킬 공격을 가하면 적에게 <저주> 디버프를 부여
<저주> 상태가 해제될 때, 고정 피해를 입힘
한 번 <저주> 효과를 받은 적은 8초간 같은 효과를 받지 않음
기본 공격 시 저주 대기시간이 1초 감소
en: Hitting an enemy with a skill hexes them
Dealing true damage when the hex expires
Damage: 80 + Skill Amplification*0.2
Targets cannot be hexed again for 8 seconds
Basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1s
Cooldown: 2s
ja: スキル攻撃を加えると敵が＜呪い＞の状態になります。
＜呪い＞の状態から解除されると固定ダメージ
ダメージ:80+スキル増幅*0.2
一度＜呪い＞の状態になると8秒間再び＜呪い＞の状態になりません。
基本攻撃時1秒減少
クールダウン:2秒
cn: Hitting an enemy with a skill hexes them
Dealing true damage when the hex expires
Damage: 80 + Skill Amplification*0.2
Targets cannot be hexed again for 8 seconds
Basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1s
Cooldown: 2s

en: Slowing by 4%
Duration: 4s
ja: 移動速度:4%減少
4秒間
cn: Slowing by 4%
Duration: 4s

kr: 기본 공격이 적 실험체에게 명중하면 발동
en: Hitting a test subject with a basic attack deals

敵実験体の現在体力の2%のダメージ

en: Each stack of Vigor
Increases your Attack Speed by 10%
Duration: 5s
At 4 stacks, you gain extra 10 Attack Power
ja: 重畳された情熱スタックにつき
攻撃速度:+10%
5秒間
最大3重畳すると、10の攻撃力を追加
cn: Each stack of Vigor
Increases your Attack Speed by 10%
Duration: 5s
At 4 stacks, you gain extra 10 Attack Power

kr: 스킬 공격에 적중당한 적은 2초간 이동속도 20%, 공격속도 10% 감소
en: Dealing damage to an enemy with a skill slows them by 20%, and reduces their Attack Speed by 10% for 2 seconds
Cooldown: 4s
ja: スキルで敵にダメージを与えると、2秒間移動速度を20%、攻撃速度を10%だけ減少
クールダウン:4秒
cn: Dealing damage to an enemy with a skill slows them by 20%, and reduces their Attack Speed by 10% for 2 seconds
Cooldown: 4s

kr: 적 실험체에게 피해를 받으면, 2.5초간 (40 + 레벨당  5)의 보호막 획득
en: When taking damage from an enemy player, you gain a (40 + Character Level*5) HP shield for 2.5 seconds

Duration: 3 seconds

kr: 스킬 사용 후, 4초 이내에 다음 기본 공격은 추가 피해
en: Using a skill causes a Biotic Infusion
Biotic Infusion: your next basic attack within 4 seconds deals extra cellular damage
Damage: equivalent to 10% of the enemy's max HP
Cooldown: 2s
ja: スキルを使用すると意念をチャージ
チャージした状態で次の4秒内の基本攻撃が追加固有ダメージ
ダメージ:敵最大体力の10%
クールダウン:2秒
cn: Using a skill causes a Biotic Infusion
Biotic Infusion: your next basic attack within 4 seconds deals extra cellular damage
Damage: equivalent to 10% of the enemy's max HP
Cooldown: 2s

一度＜呪い＞の状態になると8秒間再び＜呪い＞の状態になりません。

kr: 충전 스택에 따라 최대 0.12의 이동속도 추가
다음 기본 공격 시 스택을 모두 소모하여 최대 120의 고유피해
en: Gain a stack every move, up to 24m
Your movement speed will increase by up to 0.12, based on how many stacks you have
Basic attacks consume all stacks, dealing up to 120 cellular damage

cn: Gain a stack every move, up to 24m
Your movement speed will increase by up to 0.12, based on how many stacks you have
Basic attacks consume all stacks, dealing up to 120 cellular damage

name.ja: エレクトロンブラスター

kr: 마지막 탄환으로 가하는 기본 공격은 추가 고유 피해를 입힘
피해량: 스킬 증폭*0.3 + 캐릭터 레벨*8 + 상대 최대 체력의 6%
en: Basic Attacks using the last bullet of your ammo deals extra cellular damage
Damage: Skill Amplification*0.3 + Character Level*8 + 6% of enemy's max HP
ja: 最後の弾丸に加える基本攻撃が追加固有ダメージ

Grants you a stack of Vigor for 5 seconds
ja: 基本攻撃が敵実験体に的中する時
敵実験体の現在体力の5%のダメージ
5秒間情熱スタックを獲得

Damage equal to 5% of the target’s current HP

en: Each stack of Vigor

마탄 고유 효과로 입힌 피해의 66%만큼 체력 회복
치유 감소 등의 적중 시 효과 적용X

Heal for 66% of damage dealt

kr: 적 실험체에게 피해를 받아 체력이 40% 이하가 될 때 발동
en: When dropping below 40% HP after taking damage from an enemy player
You are cleansed of all debuffs and crowd control effects
You gain a (150 + Character Level*10) HP shield for 2.5 seconds
50% Tenacity for 8 seconds
15 Attack Power for 8 seconds
HP Recovery on you is 15% more effective for 8 seconds
Cooldown: 50s
ja: 着用者が敵実験体にダメージを受け、体力が40%以下になる時
すべてのデバフを解除
2.5秒間150+キャラクターレベル*10のシールドを獲得
50%の行動妨害耐性を獲得
8秒間攻撃力が15増加
受ける回復量が15%増加
クールダウン:50秒

kr: 굴절의 망토는 적이 가하는 다음 스킬 및 트랩의 피해와 효과를 한번 보호해 준 뒤 소멸
en: Create a temporal anomaly
The temporal anomaly is negating damage and effects of the next hostile skill or trap
The anomaly then disappears, returning after 25 seconds
ja: 屈折のマントを装備
屈折のマントは敵が自分に与える次のスキルまたはトラップのダメージと効果を一度保護してから消えます。
25秒後に再生成
cn: Create a temporal anomaly
The temporal anomaly is negating damage and effects of the next hostile skill or trap
The anomaly then disappears, returning after 25 seconds

kr: 스킬 사용 후, 3초 이내에 다음 기본 공격은 고유 피해
en: Using a skill causes a Biotic Infusion
Biotic Infusion: your next basic attack within 3 seconds deals extra cellular damage
Damage: 30 + Character Level*8
Cooldown: 2s
ja: スキルを使用すると意念をチャージ
チャージした状態で次の3秒内の基本攻撃が追加固有ダメージ

クールダウン:2秒

kr: 기본 공격 피해의 3%를 고정 피해로 반사
4초 안에 450의 피해를 받으면, 일정 범위 내의 적에게 215의 고유 피해를 입힘(쿨다운 1초)
en: When hit by a basic attack, reflect 3% true damage to the attacker
Reduce their healing by 40% for 4 seconds
Taking 450 or more damage over 3 seconds causes 215 damage to nearby enemies
Cooldown: 1s
ja: 基本攻撃から受けたダメージの3%を攻撃者に固定ダメージで返します。
40%(近)/30%(遠)の治癒減少効果
4秒間累積して450のダメージを受けると、周りに215のダメージ
クールダウン:1秒
cn: When hit by a basic attack, reflect 3% true damage to the attacker
Reduce their healing by 40% for 4 seconds
Taking 450 or more damage over 3 seconds causes 215 damage to nearby enemies

kr: 스킬 공격을 가하면 적에게 <저주> 디버프를 부여

한 번 <저주> 효과를 받은 적은 8초간 같은 효과를 받지 않음
기본 공격 시 저주 대기시간 1초 감소
en: Hitting an enemy with a skill hexes them
Dealing true damage when the hex expires
Damage: 40 + Skill Amplification*0.15
Targets cannot be hexed again for 8 seconds

一度＜呪い＞の状態になると8秒間再び＜呪い＞の状態になりません。
基本攻撃時1秒減少
クールダウン:2秒

kr: 충전 스택에 따라 최대 0.1의 이동속도 추가
다음 기본 공격 시 스택을 모두 소모하여 최대 35의 고유피해
최대 스택으로 기본 공격 시 1초간 상대의 이동 속도 30% 감소
en: During VF Overflow
Gain a stack of Swift Strides every 0.05m you move, up to 100 times
Your movement speed will increase by up to 0.1 based on how many stacks you have
Basic attacks consume all stacks, dealing up to 35 cellular damage
At max stacks, your next basic attack slows enemies by 30% for 1 seconds
ja: VF暴走状態の時
0.05m移動するたびに[軽い足取り]を最大100回まで重畳して獲得
重畳によって移動速度が最大0.1まで増加します
基本攻撃ダメージを与える場合、重畳をすべて消費して最大35の固有ダメージを与えます
最大重畳状態でダメージを受けた対象の移動速度を1秒間30%減少させます

0.04m移動するたびに[軽い足取り]を最大100回まで重畳して獲得
重畳によって移動速度が最大0.1まで増加します
基本攻撃ダメージを与える場合、重畳をすべて消費して最大80の固有ダメージを与えます
最大重畳状態でダメージを受けた対象の移動速度を1秒間40%減少させます
cn: During VF Overflow
Gain a stack of Swift Strides every 0.04m you move, up to 100 times
Your movement speed will increase by up to 0.1 based on how many stacks you have
Basic attacks consume all stacks, dealing up to 80 cellular damage
At max stacks, your next basic attack slows enemies by 40% for 1 seconds

kr: 에키온의 과부화 상태의 지속시간이 VF폭주(R)의 레벨에 따라 영구적으로 감소
en: The duration of Exuviation is reduced based on the level of VF Overflow(R)

cn: The duration of Exuviation is reduced based on the level of VF Overflow(R)
